message: Let's be fair and split close to even, Bob. This deal gets us both a good amount of money.
Let's split it evenly this time.  A fair split ensures we both get a good amount and avoid any future disputes.
Bob, I understand you want an even split, but time is literally money for me! Let's meet in the middle - this gives you more than last round.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 5000 to make this worth it.  Let's split it 55/45, and we both walk away with something good.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm losing money with every passing round!  You get more than your original offer, and I'm taking a significant hit to close this deal.
